info.author: Anomaly Software
info.description:
### Silhouette 1.0

Silhouette is a configuration schema manager for software development projects. During their development life cycle software projects maintain configuration files with a perpetually changing schema along with multiple instances of the schema for each deployment target. By placing meta information in your source control repository and using your operating system's [password manager](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/keyring)) Silhouette offers developers:

- A way to manage a true schema of target configuration files
- Keep sensitive information out of your source control repository
- Maintain values per configuration directive per deployment target
- Allow inheriting values from a base configuration (typically used for constants used by the application but usually don't differ per deployment target)
- Provide a build system to generate configuration files for each deployment target
info.name: silhouette
